titleStmt.title: A godly and holsom preseruatyue against disperacio[n] at al times necessarye for the soule: but then chiefelye to be vsed and ministred when the deuil doth assault vs most fiersely, & doth approcheth nieste.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Wyllyam Copland, for Richard Kele],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from colophon.
Another edition of STC 20203.5 (published in 1548 with title: A godlye and holsome preseruatyue against desperacio[n].).
Running title reads: A preseruatiue agaynst desperacion.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
